name: Diversion Frenzy
description:
Collect Power Gems and avoid Evil Distractions, in this item dropper Arcade game made by MGI for Western Iowa Tech Community College.

Each "Distraction object" is supposed to represent a difficulty you may encounter in trying to accomplish a goal.
These Distractions have various powers that inhibit your movement ability or your vision. Try your best to avoid these so you can get a High Score!

Collecting Power Gems Increases your score and Slightly increases your movement speed. If you ever find yourself moving slowly, Getting a Power Gem will reset your Speed.

-Score Ranking-
Beginner          - 80    - 150  ✔️
Intermediate - 150 - 250 🎇
Advanced        - 250 - 400 ✨
Expert               - 400 - 600 💎


Control Scheme: Directional movement - [W][A][S][D]  [↑] [←] [↓] [→]
🎮controller compatable🎮
